titleStmt.title: The mariage night written by the Lord Viscount Fawlkland.
titleStmt.author: Falkland, Henry Cary, Viscount, 1634-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. for R. Crofts ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Henry Cary, 4th Viscount Falkland; title cited in Burke's as The marriage night. Cf. Burke's peerage, 1970, p. 981.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
